org.gradoop.flink.model.api.layouts

Interface GraphCollectionLayout<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - type of the graph head
    V - the vertex type
    E - the edge type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Layout<V,E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphCollection, GVELayout, IndexedGVELayout, TemporalGraphCollection, TemporalGVELayout, TemporalIndexedLayout, TxCollectionLayout

    public interface GraphCollectionLayout<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge>
extends Layout<V,E>
    A graph collection layout defines the Flink internal (DataSet) representation of a graph collection containing elements of the specified types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> getGraphHeads()
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> getGraphHeadsByLabel(String label)
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection filtered by label.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> getGraphTransactions()
      Returns the graph collection represented as graph transactions.
      boolean isGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on three separate datasets.
      boolean isIndexedGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on separate datasets separated by graph, vertex and edge labels.
      boolean isTransactionalLayout()
      True, if the layout is based on a transactional data representation.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.flink.model.api.layouts.Layout

        getEdges, getEdgesByLabel, getVertices, getVerticesByLabel

    • Method Detail

      • isGVELayout

        boolean isGVELayout()
        True, if the layout is based on three separate datasets.
        Returns:
        true, iff layout based on three separate datasets.

      • isIndexedGVELayout

        boolean isIndexedGVELayout()
        True, if the layout is based on separate datasets separated by graph, vertex and edge labels.
        Returns:
        true, iff layout is based on label-separated datasets

      • isTransactionalLayout

        boolean isTransactionalLayout()
        True, if the layout is based on a transactional data representation.
        Returns:
        true, iff layout based on a transactional representation

      • getGraphHeads

        org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> getGraphHeads()
        Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection.
        Returns:
        graph heads

      • getGraphHeadsByLabel

        org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> getGraphHeadsByLabel(String label)
        Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection filtered by label.
        Parameters:
        label - graph head label
        Returns:
        graph heads

      • getGraphTransactions

        org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> getGraphTransactions()
        Returns the graph collection represented as graph transactions. Each transactions represents a single logical graph with all its data.
        Returns:
        graph transactions
